description:
Zoro’s barely breathing, and Admiral Kizaru is ready to stomp him into oblivion. The battered and beaten Straw Hats could certainly use a powerful friend right about now.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Admiral Kizaru`s Fierce Assault: The Straw Hats Face Certain Death!
L`attaque féroce de l`amiral Kizaru. Les pirates au chapeau de paille dos au mur
Taishou Kizuru no Moukou Mugiwara Ichimi Zettaizetsumei!
Атака адмирала Кизару! Команда Мугивары в критической ситуации!
هجوم الأميرال كيزارو الضّاري! يواجه طاقم قبّعة القشّ الموت المؤكّد
大将黄猿の猛攻 麦わら一味絶体絶命!
